MY PROJECTS

Find Your Beat
Python Music Finder | Jan 2019 - June 2019

Find Your Beat allows users to find music that meets their preferences. What sets this application apart from other music searchers is the organic method it uses to recommend music rather than the robotic algorithmic method used by big name searchers such as Spotify. This provides a genuine connection through music from other people with similiar tastes.
